title: Testing difficulties
content: Because filtering updates are done via a tea.Cmd producing a tea.Msg, they don't happen in the test environment because the test environment doesn't run the asynchronous command-processing loop. We can get around this for our own messages by manually invoking them and then feeding them in, but it appears `teatest` does not return us any tea.Cmd from our messages, making it impractical for us to reconstruct filtering messages produced in libraries other than our own.
